channel.title: Posts on Natalie Chin
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Natalie Chin

item.title: Solidity Visibility Keywords and Built-In Modifiers
item.description: Solidity functions are usually of the following form, where it specifies a function specifier and a modifier attributed to a certain function. This blog goes into detailed function visibility specifiers (public, external, internal, private) and a few select modifiers (pure, view) that often cause confusion among developers. function functionName() [public | external | internal | private] {pure | view} returns (bool) { return true; } Function Visibility Keywords In Solidity, there are 4 function visibility keywords, which are typically used in function definitions to explicitly state who should have access rights to a contract for a certain function.

item.title: Looking Forward Moving Back
item.description: This is a part of a previous series that I started while at STK to honour females in tech.

item.title: Girls Don't Understand Computers
item.description: There will always be people in the world who try to bring you down. It’s about who’s there to help you get back up, and how you keep going that matters.
